name: Casino Video Poker - Free Jacks or Better
name_original: Casino Video Poker - Free Jacks or Better
description:
Welcome to Casino Video Poker - Free Jacks or Better!

This Vegas style app is guaranteed to test your skill and luck. Easy to learn and hard to master. Train your poker skills with the world's most popular and classic video poker game -Jacks or Better.

Features Include:

- Vegas Casino Style Graphics
- Game Center Leader board
- Free Bonuses and Coins

Open the app each hour to get free coin bonuses! Open it each day and receive even more coin gifts! Need more coins? Find the best value for your cash in our coin store!

Thanks for playing and Good Luck!
